Dude, how can you work so fast on so many projects at the same time? You know, you are working on about 4 different launch sites or so, and are already basically finished with it, and I am only working on two and I haven't even finished the modelling phase completely yet! This is a bit annoying...
The answer is simple, Triston has a time machine.... Or he's just magic...
